result.title: Runtime error(SIGSEGV) for COT2
result.content: I was trying to solve problem. In this problem, the constraint for weight is not given. So i assumed it to be less than 1000000 and solved it accordingly. Here is my code. But it is giving RE. I have wasted a whole day to rectify it but i couldn't. Please someone help me. EDIT: I used set in place of array to store weight. So, there should not be any case of overflow.But still getting RE with code.
